name: open_account_menu
description: Open the account menu to access account-related options.

name: perform_search
description: Perform a text-based search using the search box.
parameters: {'search_query': 'What would you like to search for?'}

name: perform_voice_search
description: Initiate a voice-based search using the microphone icon.

name: perform_camera_search
description: Initiate a camera-based search using the lens icon.

name: navigate_to_section
description: Navigate to a specific section of the app (e.g., Discover, Search, Collections, More).
parameters: {'section_name': 'Which section would you like to navigate to? ["Discover", "Search", "Collections", "More"]'}

name: copy_text_to_clipboard
description: Copy a specified text to the device's clipboard.
parameters: {'text_to_copy': 'The text that needs to be copied to the clipboard.'}
